original_title: The Sarkeesian Effect: Inside the World of Social Justice Warriors
overview: The Sarkeesian Effect focuses on the controversy surrounding feminist media critic Anita Sarkeesian, Social Justice advocates, and the GamerGate movement; the title is a play on "The Streisand Effect."
tagline: There's two sides to every story...
title: The Sarkeesian Effect: Inside the World of Social Justice Warriors
